eng: Now, I think I've got everything we need to solve this problem
darija_ar: دابا تايبالّيا عندي ڭاع داكشي اللي تانحتاج باش نحلّ هاد لموشكيل
transl: Now I understand what you need to solve this problem.

eng: But she doesn't drink coffee, and she doesn't smoke, so she stays in her office.
darija_ar: والاكين هيا ماتاتشربش لقهوا, أُ ماتاتكميش, داكشي علاش كاتڭلس فل بيرو.
transl: Otherwise, she doesn't drink coffee, nor does she smoke, that's why she gets drunk on beer.

eng: Are there any women around you that you find difficult to deal with?
darija_ar: واش كاينين شي عيالات دايرين بيك اللي صعيب عليك التعامل معاهوم?
transl: Are there any girls giving you a hard time to deal with?

eng: Would it be possible for you to give me an extension to the deadline, say another two weeks?
darija_ar: واش مومكين ليك تزيدني شويا تلوقت, ڭول شي جوج سيمانات هاكّاك?
transl: Is it possible for you to lend me a little money, like a couple of hundred dirhams or so?

eng: Do I present the essay as factual or do I take a political view point?
darija_ar: واش نقدّم لماقال علا أنّاهو واقيعي أُلّا ناخود ويجهات ناضار سيياسيا?
transl: Should we accept when he says that we should not take sides politically?

eng: I've been asked to write an essay on politics but I don't know where to start
darija_ar: التڭال ليا نكتب واهد لماقال علا السياسا والاكين ماعرفتش منين نبدا
transl: He asked me to write about politics and economy, but I didn't know where to start.

eng: The only thing I'm asking you to do is keep the bottle of red
darija_ar: لحاجا لواحيدا لي كانطلب منّك تديرها هيا تشدّ لقرعا ت الروج
transl: The only thing I asked you to do is to bring it and put it on the table.

eng: Besides, I'm sure there are people who deserve more than me not to die
darija_ar: عاد زيد أنا متءكّد كاينين ناس كايستاحقّو كتر منّي أنّاهوم مايموتوش
transl: And I'm sure there are people who deserve more than me, but they don't die.

eng: With the map we would have quickly found the quickest way to the best restaurant in the area.
darija_ar: بلخاريطا كنّا دغيا غالقاو أسراع طريق ل أحسان رستورا ف السيكتور.
transl: On the map, we found a shortcut to the best restaurant in the sector.

eng: I think we should just make some tea and you should forget about work
darija_ar: كايبالّيا خسّنا نڭادّو شي برّاد ت أتاي أُ نسا عليا لخدما
transl: We need to buy a new fridge for the house because the old one broke down.

eng: I'm trying to text the co-worker at the desk.
darija_ar: هاني كانحاول نسيفت مسّاڭ ل داك اللي خدّام معايا فل بيرو.
transl: I was trying to remember the name of the waiter who was serving me at the bar.

eng: This is the third time the lift has broken in the last two weeks.
darija_ar: هادي لمرّا التالتا اللي كايخسر فيها السانسور هاد جوج سيمانات اللخرين
transl: This is the third time he's losing to censorship, those guys are really stubborn.

eng: I hear you can even get to see some beautiful birds if you're lucky
darija_ar: سمعت أنّاك تقدر تشوف شي طويّرات غزالين ألا كان عندك الزهر
transl: I heard that you can see some gazelle birds if you have the flowers.

eng: It should allow us to join the river, and the river runs towards the village
darija_ar: غايخسّ تخلّينا نوسلو لواد, أُ راه لواد دايز من ل ڤيلاج
transl: He wants us to get lost, but we know the way around the village.

eng: She calls me by my brother's name, and I have to shout and keep repeating myself
darija_ar: كاتعيّط عليا ب سميت خويا, أُ خسّني نغووّت أُنبدا نعاود لهدرا
transl: He keeps calling me by my brother's name, it annoys me and makes me want to stop talking to him.

eng: Maybe you should see a diet doctor to help you organize your food
darija_ar: إمكن خسّك تشوف شي طبيب ديال الريجيم باش إعاونك تنضّم ماكلتك
transl: Maybe you should see a diet doctor to help you organize your meals.

eng: Otherwise, next time I'll draw two pages, like Omar, who got 15.
darija_ar: أُلّا لمرّا الجايا غانكتب جوج صفحات, بحال عومار اللي جاب 15.
transl: Next time, I will write a couple of pages, like Omar who wrote 15.

eng: Well, we keep watching TV, even if we know we're spending too much time there
darija_ar: أودي, كانبقاو نتفرّجو ف تلفازا واخا كانعرفو أنّانا كانضيّعو بزّاف تلوقت
transl: Sure, we used to watch TV together, but they knew we were wasting a lot of time.

eng: Besides, you're still the winner, 'cause you're cheating with the points!
darija_ar: أُ زايدون, راك باقي نتا هوا الرابح, حيتاش كاتغوش ف نوقاط!
transl: Zaydoun, you're still the winner, because you keep scoring points!

eng: Fouad, how many more minutes before the desserts for table four will be ready?
darija_ar: فواد, شحال من دقيقا باقيا قبل مايوجد الديسير ديال طبلا ربعا?
transl: Fouad, how much flour is left before making a quarter of the dessert of the drum?

eng: That's the second mistake you've made today and you were late for work.
darija_ar: هادا لغالاط التاني لي درتي ليوما أُ راه تعطّلتي علا لخدما.
transl: This is the second excuse you've made today because you didn't do the work.

eng: I had a meeting with Soukaina at 2:00, and I hate being late!
darija_ar: كان عندي جتيماع معا صوكاينا ف ء:00, أُ ماكانحملش نكون معطّل!
transl: I had a meeting with my colleagues at 9:00, I couldn't afford to be late!

eng: Yes, I know I've been renewing this contract for a long time.
darija_ar: أيه, عرفت شحال من عام وانا كانجدّد ف هاد ل كونترا
transl: Yeah, I've been renewing this contract for years now.

eng: I don't even think I'll have any questions 'cause I understand so little.
darija_ar: موحال حتا واش أيكون عندي شي سوأل حيت كانفهم غير شويا
transl: It's impossible for me to have any questions because I only understand a little.

eng: And, seriously, do you ever really use anything you learnt in class?
darija_ar: أُ, بلمعقول, واش عمرك بسّاح خدّمتي شي حاجا قريتيها فل قيسم?
transl: Yes, it's possible. Have you ever found something you read in the textbook useful?

eng: My teacher keeps telling me that I sound like I'm translating word by word.
darija_ar: لوستاد ديالي ديما كايڭوليا أنّاني كانهدر بحالا كانترجم كلما ب كلما
transl: My teacher always tells me to speak as if I were translating word for word.

eng: I use an alias, as there are a lot of weird people out there.
darija_ar: كانخدم ب إسم موستاعار, حيت كاين بزّاف ديال بنادم فشكل هنا
transl: He works under a pseudonym because there are many people here.

eng: Hello Sandra, I have something to ask you for the next class
darija_ar: صالام ساندرا, بيت نسوولك علا شي حاجا علا قبل لحيصّا الجايّا.
transl: Hello Sandra, I wanted to ask you about something before the next meeting.

eng: But I can revise outside, there is not a lot of point being stuck in here
darija_ar: والاكين راه يمكن ليا نراجع برّا, ماكاينش لاش نبقا حاصلا هنا.
transl: Otherwise, I might consider looking elsewhere, there's no reason for me to stay here.

eng: It would be funny though and it would get other students to pay attention
darija_ar: غادي يكون هادشي كوميك أُ غادي يجيب لنتيباه ديال تلامد لخرين.
transl: This is going to be a comedy or he will bring the audience to tears of laughter.

eng: I don't know why some old people have to grumble and moan so much
darija_ar: ماعرفتش علاش شي ناسّ شارفين ديما خاسّهوم ينڭرو أُ يتشكّاو بزّاف
transl: I don't know why some people are always on the verge of losing, they keep complaining a lot.

eng: I hope in this case you go out, even alone, take walks.
darija_ar: إوا ف هاد لحالا كانتمنّا أنّاك تخروج, واخا غي بوحدك, تمشّا.
transl: Now in this situation, we wish you would leave, and if you're alone, walk away.

eng: Were you passing by or have you made a special trip to see me?
darija_ar: واش كنتي غير دايز من هنا ولا جيتي خوصوصان باش تشوفني?
transl: Are you just passing by here or did you come specifically to see me?

eng: Not bad for someone eighty five years old.
darija_ar: مزيانا ب نيسبا ل شي واحد فعمرو خمسا أُ تمانين عام.
transl: She looks good for someone who is 85 years old.

eng: I remember him, and it's true that he was always looking at you in a very inappropriate way.
darija_ar: عقلت عليه, أُ بصّاح كان ديما كايدير فيك شي شوفات فشكل.
transl: I thought about it, and honestly, he always looks at you in a strange way.

eng: He is so rich, I always thought I would get something out of it when he passed away.
darija_ar: هووا مرفّح بجّهد, ديما كنت كانڭول أنشد شي حاجا فاش أيموت.
transl: He was struggling hard, always thinking that he should achieve something before he dies.

eng: I don't feel that sorry for Anya, he will leave her lots of money I imagine
darija_ar: ماكاتبقاش فيا هاد أنيا, غادي يخلي ليها بزّاف ديال لفلوسّ تخييل
transl: He doesn't care about me at all, he's going to spend a lot of money on her, imagine that.

eng: But you also like a few glasses of good French wine for drinks.
darija_ar: والاكين عزيز عليك شي كوييسات ديال ل ڤين ديال فرانسا تشربهوم.
transl: And if you really care about me, get me some good French wines to drink.

eng: I need to turn him against Anya, and show him what a money-grabber she is
darija_ar: خاصني نقلبو علا هاد أنيا, أُ نورّيه أنّاها باغيا غي فلوسّو
transl: Let's focus on this issue, I need to show him that he wants his money.

eng: Yeah, but they're so comfortable, and when I left the house the sun way shining!
darija_ar: بصّاح, والاكين راه موريحين, أُ فاش خرجت من الدار كانت شمش!
transl: Look, the neighbors are annoying, whenever I leave the house, they gossip!

eng: Will you order it while I'm in the shower... I'll have my usual.
darija_ar: غادي تكومّانديها فاش نكون كاندووش... أنا بغيت داكشي لي موالفا كانّاخد.
transl: I'll have it when I'm done with the sandwich... I want what I ordered.

eng: No other special recipes. Only coffee English style.
darija_ar: ماكاين تا وصفا خاصّا خرا. غير لقهوا ب ستيل ديال نڭليز.
transl: There is no special recipe here. Just coffee with a touch of English style.

eng: Would you like to sit at a table and i will bring your orange juice over to you?
darija_ar: تبغي تڭولسّ ف شي طبلا أُ نجيب ليك لعاصير ديال ليمون?
transl: Do you want me to mix something in a bowl or shall I bring you a glass of lemon juice?

eng: There's plenty of activities, and the staff is very nice.
darija_ar: كاينين بزّاف ديال ل أنسهيطا, أُ الناسّ لي خدّامين هنا درييفين.
transl: There are many instances of incompetence, and the people working here are clueless.

eng: Oh yes, I met Amina on my way in, she did seem very nice
darija_ar: أييه, تلاقيت معا أمينا فاش كنت جاي, كاتبان اللاه يعمّرها دار
transl: Yeah, I met Amin when I was coming, he said "May God bless this house."

eng: I had thought it would all be bowls of watery soup and dry crackers!
darija_ar: كان كايحساب ليا واش غادي يعطيونا غير صوبّا أُ لخوبز قاسح!
transl: He was calculating whether they would only give us stale bread!

eng: Plus I thought you had secretly always loved me...
darija_ar: أُ من فوڭ هادشي كان كايحساب ليا واش كاتبغيني ف السير...
transl: He was thinking about whether you love me in secret...

eng: You have always been there, through my 5 previous failed marriages
darija_ar: راه كنتي ديما حاضرا, ف 5 ديال تجويجات ديالي اللي ماصدقوش
transl: You were always there, for the 5 marriages of mine that didn't work out.

eng: And that our time together would come when we were still young enough to enjoy it
darija_ar: أُ غادي يجي وقتنا فاش كنّا مازال سغار باش نتبرعو بيه
transl: He will come at a time when we are still young to donate with it.

eng: He's young, but that doesn't excuse his selfishness.
darija_ar: مازال شاب, والاكين هادشي ماكايشفعش ليه علا ديك ل أنانيا ديالو.
transl: He's still young, and what's happening doesn't matter to him because he's selfish.

eng: You think you're so smart... playing with me all this time... I HATE you...
darija_ar: كايحساب ليك راسك دكي... كاتلعب بيا هاد لمودّا كاملا... كان كرهك...
transl: You think you're smart, playing with me in this whole game... you used to hate it...

eng: We need to save our energy for the climb and the long walk down.
darija_ar: غادي يخصنا نحتافضو علا الطاقا ديالنا علا قبل طلعا أُ النزلا.
transl: We need to conserve our energy before going out or welcoming guests.

eng: I think the main thing is that it is difficult not to be completely in control
darija_ar: كانضن أنّاهو أهام حاجا هيا أنّاهو سعيب ماتكونش كاتحكّم ف كولشي
transl: He thought he was important, but he's just a failure who doesn't control anything.

eng: I don't understand how you can be happy about doing nothing for hours.
darija_ar: مافهمتش كيفاش يمكن تكون فرحان أُ نتا ماكادّير والو لمودّات ساعات.
transl: I don't understand how you can be happy when you hardly ever smile.

eng: But it's your turn to choose, it's your birthday, after all!
darija_ar: والاكين راه نوبتك باش تختاري, راه عيد ميلادك, ف نيهايات لماطاف!
transl: It's your turn to choose, it's your birthday after all, so enjoy it to the fullest!

eng: I know you have your computer with you, it's perfect.
darija_ar: أنا عارف بلي راه ل پك كاين معاك, هوا مازيان بزف.
transl: I know you have the pack with you, it's good for the trip.

eng: Although you may be onto something with your idea of the fire.
darija_ar: واخا إقدر تكون علا شي حاجا معا لفيكرا ديالك علا لعافيا.
transl: And if you can focus on something with your thoughts on your health.

eng: Because moving blind with a wounded knee doesn't seem like a good idea to me.
darija_ar: حيت تحرك بلا ماتشوف معا جارحا فراكبا ماكاتبانش بلي فيكرا مازيانا.
transl: When you move without looking, you might end up with a wound that won't heal easily.

eng: I could sing a funny English song about dead bodies, the worms go in and the worms go out
darija_ar: نقدر نغاني أُغنييا مودحيكا علا جوتات مايتين, الدود كايدخل أُ كايخرج
transl: We can sing our praises on the rooftops, the worm goes in and comes out.

eng: Maybe we should have some tea together and that may help our relationship
darija_ar: إمكان خاسنا شي أتاي بجوجنا أُ هادشي ياقدر يعاون لعالاقا ديالنا
transl: Maybe we lost a key in our room, this could help us find it and solve our problem.

eng: you can stay as long as you want in the shower and drink your beer
darija_ar: يامكن ليك تبقا لواقت ليبغيتي ف لحامّام أُ تشراب لبيرّا ديالك
transl: Maybe you can stay a bit longer if you want in the hammam and have a drink of your beer.

eng: we are planning to move to the west coast of Brittany after all!
darija_ar: حنا كانخاطو باش نتاقلو لساحل لغاربي ديال بريتانيا من باعد كولشي!
transl: We are planning to travel to the west coast of Brittany in France from quite a distance!

eng: I hate this country, or it does a terrible time 9 months a year.
darija_ar: تانكره هاد لبالاد, أُلا كايداوز واقت خايب 9 شوهور ف لعام
transl: This country is amazing, but it's facing a severe crisis for 9 months now.

eng: Are you visiting the town? I don't think I have seen you in here before
darija_ar: واش هي دايز من لمدينا? ماكانضنّش فايت شافتك هنا من قبال
transl: Is she from our city? I didn't think she had seen you here before.

eng: And you know how much I like butter and cheese and rich, tasty foods
darija_ar: أُنتا كاتعرف شحال كانبغي زابدا أُ جبان أُ لماكلا لغانيّا, أُلّديدا
transl: You know how much I used to love butter on bread and honey, right? Good times.

eng: Besides, this is the safest way to transport it, as they say.
darija_ar: أُ زايدون, هادي هيا أكتار تاريقا امينا باش إدّيوها, كيما كايڭولو.
transl: Zaydoun, this is the most trustworthy information to give them, as they requested.

eng: But you know I like to cook, so I can also do one of the things if you want.
darija_ar: راك عارفني عاندي معا طياب, إدان نقدر ندير شيحاجا إلا بغيتي.
transl: You know I have patience, we can do anything you want.

eng: I've got most people in email so that would be the quickest way.
darija_ar: عاندي أغلابيا ت الناس ف إمايل أُ هادي غاتكون أسّراع طاريقا.
transl: I have a lot of followers on social media, so this will be a faster way.

eng: We'll be really naughty, and smoke two of my small cigars as well.
darija_ar: غادي نكونو باسلين بزاف, أُ غادي نكميو جوج ڭوارووات سغار ديالي
transl: We will be very happy, and we will share a few of my small secrets.

eng: We will just have to go into the garden with two cigars and two glasses
darija_ar: غادي غير يخاسنا نمشيو لجاردا ب جوج ڭوارو أُ جوج كيسان
transl: He's just going to let us go to the neighbor's house for a couple of minutes.

eng: I have a call with the Rabat office in less than 15 minutes.
darija_ar: عندي موكالاما معا لبيرو ف ربات ف قلّ من 15 دقيقا.
transl: I have a meeting with the boss in less than 15 minutes.

eng: If you paid me more I would press more buttons for help
darija_ar: كون خلّستيني كتار, كون ورّكت علا بزاف ديال لبوتونات باش إعاونوك
transl: You left me alone for a long time, I've clicked on many buttons to help you.

eng: You'll never guess who I ran into at the mosque last Saturday - Driss!
darija_ar: ماغاديش تقدر تعراف معامن تلاقيت ف الجامع سبت ليداز - ضريسّ!
transl: You won't believe the amount of money I found at the mosque last Friday - unbelievable!

eng: though you know what happened with his wife last year
darija_ar: والاكين راك عارف داكشي ليوقع ليه معا مراتو لعام لي فات
transl: Do you know what happened between him and his wife last year?

eng: If you like nature it's hard to escape insect bites
darija_ar: إلا كنتي كاتبغي الطابيعا صعيب أناكا تهراب مان قرسات ديال باخوش
transl: If you love nature, it's hard for you to escape the beauty of the mountain peaks.

eng: But why the clogged nose, you're allergic to something: Flowers, trees...?
darija_ar: والاكين علاش كايتساد نيف, عانداك حاساسيا من شي حاجا: وارد, شجر...?
transl: Why is he getting upset for no reason, do you have any sensitivities to something: flowers, trees...?

eng: We could just wander aimlessly and hope we find our way back.
darija_ar: إمكان لينا ندورو بلا تاشي هاداف أُنتمنّاو نلقاو تريق باش نرجعو.
transl: We can search without anything specific in mind, hoping to find a clue to guide us back.

eng: I just thought you'd like the chance to defend yourself
darija_ar: راه هير صحابني واش نتا بغيتي فورصا باش دافاع علا راسك
transl: He's telling my friends that if you want right now, you can defend yourself.

eng: I think you should, as a boss, do something to make these blackouts stop!
darija_ar: كاندن خاسك, بصيفتك راإس, دير شي حاجا بش تحباس قتيع دو
transl: Be yourself, in your own way, do something that will make you feel proud.

eng: All I'm asking for is half of your salary for the next twenty years
darija_ar: كانتلاب مانك غير ناس ديال الصالير ديالك ف عيشرين عام الجايا
transl: Your only concern should be your own financial matters in the coming twenty years.

eng: Look at this one, every time he goes for the piece of bread to steal from his rightful recipient
darija_ar: شوف هادا, كول مرا كايمشي لطارف ديال لخوبز باش يسراقو لمولاه
transl: Look at this, every time a woman goes to the bakery, they steal from her husband.

eng: When I was little, I hated my cousin, in the country, who sometimes put turtles on her back.
darija_ar: فاش كانت سغير, كراهت بنت عمّي, كانت كادّير فكارن فوق ضهارها
transl: When she was young, my cousin's daughter used to play with dolls in her backyard.

eng: I'm really tired today... so I say we stay by the pool!
darija_ar: أنا عيان بزاف ليوم... داكشي علاش كانڭول نبقاو حدا لا پيسسين
transl: I'm very tired today... that's why I suggest we stay home and relax.

eng: She can read her book under a parasol and we can build sand castles!
darija_ar: إمكن ليها تقرا كتابها تاحت لپاراسول أُ نقادرو نبنيو لقيلاع براملا
transl: She can read her book under the parasol while we build sandcastles on the beach.

eng: I want to build sand castles, eat lollies, go on a hike.
darija_ar: بغيت نابني قلاع راملييا, ناكول پولو, أُ نمشي تسركيلا علا رجلين
transl: I want to build sand castles, eat paella, and walk barefoot on the beach.

eng: I build sand castles eat lollies and go for walks, as I said.
darija_ar: كانبني لقيلاع راملييا أُ كاناكول پولو أُ كانمشي نتنازاه كيف ڭلت
transl: He built a sandcastle while eating popcorn and walking nonchalantly as if nothing happened.

eng: and it was pouring with rain so I got wet running for the train
darija_ar: أُ كانت شتا داكشي باش فزڭت و أنا كانجري ل تراين
transl: She did that to provoke me while I was trying to calm down.

eng: The train was full so I had to stand all the way in to town
darija_ar: كان تران عامر, داكشي علاش بقيت وقافا طريق كاملها تال لمادينا
transl: You used to be full of life, that's why I stopped the whole journey to Medina.

eng: I'm hungry, too, we can go to the restaurant if you want.
darija_ar: حتا أنا فيا جوع, إمكن لينا نمشيو لشي مطعام إلا بغيتي.
transl: Even I'm hungry, we can go to any restaurant you want.

eng: Well when he was on that island in Castaway he must have eaten meat!
darija_ar: واخا ملي كان فديك لجازيرا ف كاستاواي أيكون داروري كلا لحم!
transl: Even if you were on an island in Castaway, you would still crave meat!

eng: Perhaps we could use them as a starter and then do a meat dish.
darija_ar: يمكان نخدمو بيهوم كا بيدايا أُنڭادّو تاباق ديال لحام من بعد.
transl: We can use it as a guide for welding joints afterwards.

eng: It's normal to have a little stress in a volume as small as the elevator
darija_ar: راه طابيعي يكون عنداك شوييا ديال ضاغت فبلاسا سغيرا بحال سانسور
transl: It's normal to have a bit of stress in public places, like censorship.

eng: Childhood memories always remain in memory, especially if they're unpleasant!
darija_ar: ديكرايات ديال توفولا ديما كاتبقا ف داكيرا, خوسوسان إلا كانت خايبا!
transl: The memories of childhood always remain in the heart, especially if they were happy!

eng: Will you get me something from the shop round the corner?
darija_ar: تقدار تجيب لييا معاك شي حاجا مان لماحال لي ف لقونت
transl: Can you bring me something to eat when you come to the meeting?

eng: I've spent time in France, Germany and South America
darija_ar: دوازت شوييا ديال لواقت ف فرانسا أُ ألمانيا أُ أمريكا لجانوبييا
transl: I traveled a bit to France, Germany, and America, and also to South America.

eng: I don't drink much at all, really only at special occasions where I like a glass of champagne
darija_ar: أنا ماكانشربش بزاف, فاقاط ف لموناسابات كانبغي شي كاس ديال شامپانيا
transl: I don't drink much, but at special occasions, I like a glass of champagne.

eng: you tried to isolate yourself to eat but couldn't find a quiet room
darija_ar: حاولتي تعزال راسك باش تاكول أُ مالقيتيش بلاصا فين تاكول مارتاح
transl: You tried to clear your mind to eat, but couldn't find a place where you could eat comfortably.

eng: I spent most of the day writing something that I wanted to work on
darija_ar: وازت تقريبان النهار كامل كانكتب شي حاجا كانت بغيت نخدم عليها
transl: Almost the whole day you were writing something you wanted me to help with.

eng: If we all used computers at school it would be better for the planet!
darija_ar: إلا كولّنا ستاعمالنا أجهيزا ديال كومپيوتر فلمادراسا, غادي يكون حسان لكاوكابنا!
transl: Except for when we finish our computer equipment projects in Madrid, it will be beneficial for our company!

eng: I have to leave now, because the next class starts in one minute!
darija_ar: خاسني نامشي دابا, حيت لحيصا الجايا غادي تبدا من دابا دقيقا
transl: Leave me alone now, because what's coming next will start from this moment exactly.

eng: What do you think of the healthy eating initiative that the Government are getting involved in?
darija_ar: أش بان ليك فلموبادارا ديال لأكل السيحي لي داخلا فيها لحوكوما?
transl: What do you think of the government's handling of the recent health crisis?

eng: it's much more interesting than your history of genealogist and treasure
darija_ar: هادشي أكتار إتارا ليهتيمام من تاريخك فعيلم ل أنساب أُ لكانز"
transl: This is something that requires attention from your history and knowledge of genealogy.

eng: It imagines things that might have happened to a real smuggling gang
darija_ar: كايتخايال شي حوايج لي إقدرو إكونو وقعو لعيسابا ديال تهريب حاقيقييا
transl: Some things that they imagine could have actually happened in the world of real smuggling.

eng: Oh, no, I'd be too afraid if they found out I was listening
darija_ar: أُه, لا, غادي نكون خايف بزاف إلا عارفو بيلا كانتصانّات عليهوم
transl: Oh no, I will be very scared unless they know who they are dealing with.

eng: Well, that will give us a good basis to start with next time
darija_ar: واخا, هادي غادي تعتينا أساس زوين باش نبداو بيه لمرّا جايا
transl: And this will give us a good foundation to start with next time.

eng: Well, I am an English teacher, so I'm not sure I'll be much help...
darija_ar: أودي, أنا أُستاد ديال نڭليزيا, داكشي علاش مامتأكادش واش غانعاونك مزيان...
transl: Okay, I'm an English teacher, that's why I can't really tell if I can help you much...

eng: I'll talk to the head and see what we can do to investigate
darija_ar: غادي نهضر معا راإس أُ نشوف أش نقادّو نديرو باش نحقّو
transl: I will talk to the boss to see what we can do to improve and succeed.

eng: a box of milk chocolates and the Sunday newspapers
darija_ar: شي بواطا ديال شوكلات ب لحليب, أُ لجاراإد ديال نهار لحاد
transl: A piece of chocolate cake with milk, the perfect dessert for a lazy afternoon.

eng: At your age, living in a world of Manga and cartoons, pathetic
darija_ar: ڭدّ هاكّا, أُباقي كاتعيش فعالام تل مانڭا أُ روسوم موتاحاريكا, ماكاتحشمش
transl: That's right, she lives in a world of manga and Russian cartoons, she's not ashamed.

eng: I need a real man who can take care of his partner
darija_ar: أنا محتاجا ل راجل حاقيقي لي إمكان ليه إعتاني بشاريك ديالو
transl: I need a real man who can take care of his responsibilities.

eng: if we could have a date two hours before, it wouldn't be bad
darija_ar: إلا كانتي قادار تاخاد ماوعيد قبال ساعتاين, ماغاديش تكون لقاديا خايبا
transl: If you can't pick it up within two hours, you won't be a reliable driver.

eng: But I could really use some help wearing it and set it up
darija_ar: والاكين إمكان ليا بصاح نستاعمل شوييا تلموساعادا ف باش نلبّسو أُنصاوبو
transl: I have some old clothes that I can use to make a new outfit.

eng: If there are sailors, there's gonna be a wide range of the drinks
darija_ar: إلا كانو لباحارا, فا راه غادي إكون ماجموعا كبيرا ديا شراب
transl: If they're at the beach, then it's going to be a big gathering with a lot of drinks.

eng: And if you ever get any ideas, don't hesitate to call me back
darija_ar: أُ إلا عمّر جاوك شي أفكار, ماتردادش تسوني عليا مرا خرا
transl: When those thoughts come to you, don't hesitate to share them with me, my friend.

eng: This is the kind of day we would've preferred not to get up in the morning
darija_ar: هادا هوا ناوع ديال لأيّام لي كاتفضّل ماتفيقش فيه ڭاع فسباح
transl: This is the type of weather that you prefer not to wake up early for swimming.

eng: if you are stressed and need to take time off, it will only make the situation worse
darija_ar: إلا كانتي مسترسّي أُكاتحتاج عوطلا, فهادشي ماغادي إدّي غير ما كفس
transl: Unless you're feeling unwell and need rest, this won't be resolved until you calm down.

eng: He may be suffering himself, but bullying you needs reporting
darija_ar: إقدر إكون هوا كايعاني هوا براسو, والاكين تانامور خاساك تبلاغ عليه
transl: I can feel his suffering, but if he's bothering you, you should report him.

eng: Besides, there's no time to take a nap from the workload, it's a scandal!
darija_ar: أُزيد علا داكشي, ماكاينش واقت ديال لقايلولا من كترت لخادما, فضيحا!
transl: On top of that, there is no shortage of gossip due to the abundance of servants, what a scandal!

eng: If my suspicions are correct, to do so, would mean coming down with depression
darija_ar: إلا كانت شوكوك ديالي فماحلّها, باش الديرها, كايعني نجيو ب كتيأب
transl: Unless my doubts are resolved, I won't allow it to happen, which means we might end up in a fight.

eng: The funny thing is I have no idea where I am now
darija_ar: لحاجة ليكادحّاك هيا أنّاني ماعندي حتا فيكرا علا فين أنا دابا
transl: The only thing that concerns you is yourself, you don't even think about where I am now.

eng: And since he's got a pond and some ducks, I come here a lot
darija_ar: أُ ملّي عندي ضايا أُشوييا ديال لباطّ, فاراه كانجي لهنا بزاف
transl: Whenever I have guests, I usually grill some meat, they really like it here.

eng: lucky for me I had some bread in my bag
darija_ar: من حوسن حاضّي كان عندي شويا ديال لخوبز ف الساك ديالي
transl: Last night, I had some bread in my bag.

eng: It's been a hard winter for them and I don't think they've had very much to eat
darija_ar: كان شتا سعيب بنسبا ليهوم أُماكانضنش واش عندهوم بزاف ديال لماكلا
transl: He thought it was a bit difficult for them, but he didn't realize they had a lot of food.

eng: I don't think you can beat waking up to the noisy sound of the birds
darija_ar: ماكانضنش واش إمكان إغالب علا نواد علا ساوت ديال تيور لقاساح
transl: I didn't think it was possible to overcome the challenges of the mountain's steep slopes.

eng: especially in South America where there are extraordinary animals in the Amazon forest
darija_ar: أكتاريا ف أمريكا لجانوبيا فين كاينين حاياونات فشكل ف غابات أمازون
transl: Many areas in America, especially in the south, have unique wildlife in the form of Amazon rainforests.

eng: What matters is that there's a pretty nurse like that giving you massages
darija_ar: ليكايهام هوا أناهو كاينا موماريدا زوينا بحال هادي كادير ليك ماسّاڭ
transl: He's not bothering me, I don't want anything nice like what he's doing to you.

eng: Shall we invite one or two of the others and we can all play poker?
darija_ar: واش نعارضو علا شي واهد أُلا جوج خرين أُنقدرو نلعبو پوكر?
transl: Do we argue about something or are we just waiting for the rest of the guys to play poker?

eng: Unfortunately, our time is up, it's time for my next patient
darija_ar: لسوء لحاض, تسالا لواقت ديالنا, جا لواقت لماريدا ديالي ليمن باعد
transl: Unfortunately, when it comes to our time, it's the time of my beloved Maryam who is far away.

eng: Yes, you see, there are 12 and come every day at 2:00
darija_ar: أه, كيما كاتشوف, كاينين 12 أُ كايجيو كول نهار معا ء:00
transl: Oh, as you can see, there are 12 of them coming every day at 3:00.

eng: Is it okay that the exam will cover all of the concepts that you saw in the second semester?
darija_ar: واش مان لمافرود لمتيحان يغاطّي ڭاع مافاهيم ليقريتوها ف الدورا تانيا?
transl: Doesn't it bother you that the teacher covers what we didn't understand in the second round?

eng: and perhaps a bit of coconut milk if you have some
darija_ar: أُ يمكان شوييا من لحليب جوز لهيند إلا كان عنداك شوييا
transl: Could I have a little bit of coconut milk if you have some?

eng: I was only a bit concerned as you said you were so hungry and did not prioritise eating
darija_ar: كنت خايفا شوييا حيت ڭالتي بيلا كنتي جيعان أُ ماسبّقتيش لماكلا
transl: I was a little scared because you said you were hungry and you didn't eat before.

eng: Take cheap ingredients, it's only a birthday, not the reception of an amp
darija_ar: خود موكاوينات رخيسا, راه غير عيد ميلاد, ماشي إستيقبال ديال أمير
transl: Get some cheap snacks, it's not a birthday party, it's just a casual gathering.

eng: Hi, is this the first time you've been on a plane?
darija_ar: أهلان, واش هادي هييا لمارّا لاولا ليغادي تسافار بيها ف طايارا?
transl: Hello, is this the itinerary for the first trip you're traveling by plane with?

eng: Its always good to have some meat free dishes anyway
darija_ar: راه مازيان يكونو عنداك شي تباسال بلا لحام علا كول حال
transl: It's better to have a question without an answer than to have an answer that can't be questioned.

eng: But vegans, well, I think if there is someone else it would be better
darija_ar: والاكين ناباتييين, واخا, كانضن إلا كان شي حد أخور غاتكون مزيانا
transl: And the neighbors are annoying, but if there's someone else, it will be better.

eng: but we do not want the clients to know we are stuck in the lift do we?
darija_ar: والاكين مابغيناش لكليان يعرفو بيلا حنا واحلين ف سانسور, أولّا لا?
transl: We don't want everyone to know everything about us, right?

eng: I could call them, make them think I'm your secretary
darija_ar: نقدر نعيت ليهوم, أُ نخاليوهوم يسحاب ليهوم بيلا أنا سيكريتيرا ديالك
transl: We can inform them, or we can let them figure it out themselves without me being your secretary.

eng: I don't know anything about holy days or religious events
darija_ar: أنا ماعارفت تا حاجة علا هاد لييام لموقاداسّا ولا لموناسابات دينييا
transl: I don't understand anything these days, neither socially nor spiritually.

eng: Oh come on, I've had enough of getting burnt in the sun and doing crosswords
darija_ar: أودي هير أجي, راه ملّيت مان نتحرق فشمس أُنلعاب لكاليمات لموتاقاتيعا
transl: I want to leave now, I'm tired of getting sunburned while playing volleyball on the beach.

eng: I have come to speak to you because you are a teacher and other students are upsetting my friend
darija_ar: جيت ندوي معاك حيت نتا أُستاد أُ تلامد لخرين كايمرّضو ساحبي
transl: I came to support you because you are a teacher who helps others when they are sick, my friend.

eng: but I am only a child so I can't get him lenses
darija_ar: والاكين أنا غير دري سغير إدان مايمكنش ليا نجيب ليه عاداسات
transl: I don't know anyone else who can get me those shoes except you.

eng: I am thirsty but I was hoping for something a bit stronger that water
darija_ar: فيا لعطش والاكين كنت كانتمنا شي حاجا قاسحا شوييا علا لما
transl: Whether thirsty or hungry, I was hoping for something a bit spicy on the plate.

eng: I don't like working in a team as I end up doing all the work
darija_ar: ماكانبغيش نخدم ف مجموعا حيت ف نيهايا لماتاف كاندير لخدما كولّها
transl: I didn't want to work in a group because in the end, when it came to doing all the work, I was the one doing it all.

eng: He comes to the UK often but his children are too little to travel much
darija_ar: كايجي ل نڭليز بزاف والاكين ولادو باقي سغار علا السافار بزاف
transl: He speaks English very well, but his children are still young for a long journey.

eng: And with bad breath, impossible for me to show up in public
darija_ar: أُماعا ريحا ديال لفوم خايبا, موستاحيل نبان فلءماكين لي فيها الناس
transl: The smell of the rotten eggs is unbearable, it's impossible not to notice it in the room where people are.

eng: I know a very good recipe for garlic soup which uses forty cloves
darija_ar: كانعرف واصفا واعرا تلحريرا ديال توم أُلي كانستخدمو فيها غي فاسّا
transl: I know a recipe for tomato sauce that they used to make in Fes.

eng: As I said I am the boss and you will do as you are told
darija_ar: كيف ڭلت ليك أنا شف أُغادي دير داكشي لي ڭلت ليك
transl: How can I trust you when I see you doing the same thing you promised not to do?

eng: Smelling of garlic will stop you flirting with the waitresses anyway
darija_ar: غادي تمنعاك ريحا ديال توم مان موغازالات سربيات كيما كان لحال
transl: The smell of garlic will keep mosquitoes away just like it used to.

eng: Can you get me a nice cold drink with some ice please
darija_ar: واش تقدر تجيب لييا ماشروب بارد معا شوييا ديال تالج عافاك
transl: Can you bring me a cold drink with a little ice, please?

eng: But when we got in the lift my boss started to tell me this story
darija_ar: والاكين منين ركابنا لماسعاد, بدا راإس ديالي كايعاواد لييا ديك لقيصّا
transl: Where are our belongings when we're happy, my head starts to remember those memories.

eng: Well, I think you've had a really bad day, and you're mostly in a bad mood
darija_ar: واخا, كانضن بيلا داوزتي نهار خايب, أُنتا غاليبان ف مازاج خايب
transl: Even if you think your day was bad, you're definitely in a bad mood.

eng: While the lift was stopped he said we should use the time doing my appraisal!
darija_ar: منين وقاف لماسعاد, ڭالييا بيلا خاسنا نستاغلّو لواقت ف تاقييم ديالي
transl: Since happiness stopped by, let's make the most of this moment to evaluate my life.

eng: I would go for a lie down to calm down a bit, but I see the cat is on the stairs
darija_ar: كنت غادي نتاكا باش نتهادان شوييا والاكين كنشوف لمشا ف دروج
transl: I was going to call you so we could chat for a bit, or maybe even go for a walk.

eng: Do you want your guests to pay for their own meal or will you pay for eveything?
darija_ar: واش بغيتي ضويوف ديالك يخالسو ماكلتهوم ولا غادي تخالاس نتا كولشي?
transl: Do you want your guests to eat what they like or will you choose everything yourself?

eng: honestly, sometimes i wonder where you kids get your training nowadays
darija_ar: بسارحا, شي مارات كانتساءل منين كاياخدو دراري سغار تادريب فهاد لواقت
transl: Sometimes, some women wonder where men get their small tricks during training at this time.

eng: Now, I think I've got everything we need to solve this problem!
darija_ar: دابا كانضن عندنا كولشي داكشي اللي كانحتاجو باش نحالو هاد لموشكيلا
transl: Now I think we have everything we need to start this project.

eng: the price was a steal for the features the item offered
darija_ar: علا لقواليت ديال لپرودويت تشريه بهاد تامان را شي حاجا هربانا
transl: When it comes to the quality of the product, buying it at this price is a steal.

eng: the referee's decisions were closely scrutinized by both sides
darija_ar: لجومهور بزوج كانو كيتحقو واش تسفار ديال لحاكام كان فيه علاش
transl: The couple were arguing about whether the trip to the beach was worth it.

eng: how do you handle stress or busy days?
darija_ar: كيفاش كادير فلييام لي كاتكون فيهوم مسترسّي و عامر خدما ?
transl: How can I trust someone who is always suspicious and full of excuses?

eng: have you ever tried any extreme sports or adventures?
darija_ar: ماعمرك ماجربتي شي سپورت قاسح ولا مشيتي فشي موخامارا سعيبا ?
transl: Have you ever tried a tough sport or gone hiking in a challenging terrain?

eng: what songs do you enjoy listening to while exercising?
darija_ar: أشناهييا لأوخنييا لي كايعجبك تسمع ليها و نتا كادير رييادا ?
transl: What are the songs or tunes that you like to listen to while you are working on your projects?

eng: what's a song that you can listen to on repeat?
darija_ar: شي وخنييا لي تعيا ماتسمع ليها ماعمرها مكاتلع ليك فراسّك ?
transl: A true friend is someone who never turns a deaf ear to you no matter what.

eng: i can't decide between a beach vacation or a mountain retreat for the next trip
darija_ar: ماعرفتش واش نختار شي عوتلا فلبحر ولا راحا فجبال فسفر جاي
transl: I don't know whether to choose a trip to the beach or a trip to the mountains for the upcoming vacation.

eng: you're the only one who understands my obsession with cute animal videos
darija_ar: نتا بوحدك لي عارفني شحال كانحماق علا ڤيدووات ديال لحاوايانت زويونين
transl: You're the only one who knows how silly I was in those videos of the two of us.

eng: road trips are fun until you realize how uncomfortable car seats can be
darija_ar: سفر فتونوبيل ولا لكار كيبان نادي تاكاتحسّ شحال ماشي موريحا لڭلسّا
transl: Whether by car or by plane, the feeling of traveling always brings a sense of excitement and adventure.

eng: we should totally recreate our old childhood photos that would be hilarious
darija_ar: كون خير عاودنا هادوك تساور ديال سخر, را لموت ديال دحك
transl: Be kind and bring us those plates of laughter, not the death of tears.

eng: remember when we thought adults had all the answers?
darija_ar: عقلتي فاش كان كيتسحاب لينا لكبار عندهوم ڭاع ل أجويبا ?
transl: Did you think he was going to bring us some snacks for the elders' gathering?

eng: remember when we thought being a teenager was the ultimate freedom?
darija_ar: عقلتي ملي كان كيحسبانا أنا لحايات ديال لموراهيق كولها حورييا ?
transl: Did you think that he was considering all my crazy actions as freedom?

eng: let's plan a cozy night in blankets, comfort food, and movies
darija_ar: يالّاه نبلانيو شي ليلا ناديا بلمانتات و لماكلا و شي أفلام
transl: Let's plan a night with friends, snacks, drinks, and movies.

eng: have you ever tried watching a show but ended up falling asleep every time?
darija_ar: ماعمرك ماجربتي تفرج فشي برنامج و سدقتي ناعسّ كولا مرا ?
transl: Have you ever watched a show and believed it was real even once?

eng: i'm convinced that laughter is the best remedy for any bad day
darija_ar: أنا مقتانع بلي داحك هوا أحسّن دوا ل أي نهار خايب
transl: I am convinced that laughter is the best medicine for any gloomy day.

eng: let's plan a day trip to a nearby town we've never explored
darija_ar: أجي نبلانيو شي سافاريا ديال نهار ل شي مدينا قريبا نكتاشفوها
transl: Let's plan a daytime safari to a nearby city and explore it.

eng: i'm convinced that we could communicate in a room full of just facial expressions
darija_ar: أنا مقتانعا بلي نقدرو نتفاهمو ف بلاسّا عامرا خا ب وجوهنا
transl: I am convinced that we can communicate fully even without speaking.

eng: have you ever faced a problem you thought was invincible ?
darija_ar: عمرك تحتي ف شي موشكيل لي ڭلتي عمرك تخرج منو ?
transl: Have you ever been in a situation where you didn't know how to get out of it?

eng: if you were told to go to any country you want, what would you choose ?
darija_ar: إلا ڭالوليك تمشي ل أي بلاد بغيتي أشمن وحدا تختار ?
transl: If they told you to go to any country you want, which one would you choose?

eng: if you could choose one superpower, what would it be?
darija_ar: إلا كانت تقدر تكون عندك شي قودورات خاريقا شنو تختار ?
transl: If you could have any superpower, what would you choose?

eng: remember when we'd conspire to avoid family events together?
darija_ar: باقا عاقل ملي كنا أنعواي مانديرو باش نتجمعوش معا لعاإلا ?
transl: Are you still sane if we don't agree to meet up together tomorrow?

eng: can you help me find a product that's similar to this, but in a different color?
darija_ar: تقدر تعاوني نلقاشي پرودويت بحال هادا والاكين يكون لون مبدل ?
transl: Can you help me find a product like this or does it have to be a different color?

eng: is it possible to split the payment between cash and card?
darija_ar: واش نقدر نقسّم تامان نسّ نخلسو بكارتا و نسّ لاخور كاسه
transl: Can we split the bill in half, half of it we pay by card and the other half in cash?

eng: can you guide me to the aisle where i can find cleaning supplies?
darija_ar: تقدر توريني فين كاين لرايون ديال دكشي ديال ماواد تنديف ?
transl: Can you show me where the section for cleaning products is?

eng: could you assist me in finding products suitable for sensitive skin?
darija_ar: ت قدر تقلب معايا علا شي پرودويت ديال بشرا حسّاسّ ?
transl: Can you help me with a sensitive human product?

eng: can you tell me if this product is available for same day delivery?
darija_ar: تقدر تشوف واش هاد لپرودويت يوسلني فنفسّ نهار ولا لا ?
transl: Can you check if this product is available for me today or not?

eng: could you let me know if there's a discount available for students?
darija_ar: تقدر تشوف لييا واش كاين شي سولد خير ديال تولاب ?
transl: Can you check for me if there is a good deal on laptops?

eng: what do you think about trying that new restaurant in town this weekend?
darija_ar: أش بان ليك نجربو هاداك رستورا جديد فلمدينا هاد سيمانا ?
transl: How about we try that new restaurant in the city this week?

eng: let's have a date night where we try cooking a new recipe together
darija_ar: خلينا ندوزو شي ليلا لي لتيبو فيها مجموعين شي وسفا جديدا
transl: Let's spend an evening where we can all enjoy some new music.

eng: what's your opinion on taking a cooking class together to learn a new cuisine?
darija_ar: أش بان ليك ناخدو شي حيسّاسّ نتعلمو فيهوم تياب مجموعين ?
transl: What do you think if we take some sewing lessons to learn how to make clothes together?

eng: let's plan a surprise romantic date night under the stars
darija_ar: يالّاه شي نهار نديرو شي ءشا روماسّي فليل تحت من نجوم
transl: Let's plan a romantic evening under the stars.

eng: can you share your thoughts on the team's performance during the first half?
darija_ar: تقدر تدوي لينا علا لءب ديال فرقتل ليوما فپرمير ميتا ?
transl: Can you play us the latest song of the band that was released yesterday on YouTube?

eng: how do you feel about your individual performance and contribution to the game?
darija_ar: أش بان ليك فلعبك نتا و لموساهاما ديالك فهاد لماتش ?
transl: What do you think about your performance and that of your teammates in this match?

eng: can you elaborate on the tactics that led to your team's successful comeback?
darija_ar: تقدر كتهرح لينا كتر لخوتا لي خلات فرقتكوم ترع فلماتش ?
transl: Can you tell us more about the brothers who caused the fight in your group?

eng: can you discuss your relationship with your fellow teammates ?
darija_ar: تقدر تدوي لينا علا لعالاقا ديالك معا لعابا ديال فرقتك ?
transl: Can you tell us about your experience with your band's tours?

eng: and the spontaneous decision to camp there for the night was the icing on the cake
darija_ar: و ملي قررنا خير هاكاك نخيمو لهيها فليل كانت أحسّن حاجا
transl: And when we decide, we'll go camping in the mountains, it would be the best thing.

eng: perfect! i've been wanting to try some authentic italian dishes
darija_ar: سافي نيت مودا هادي و أنا باخي نجرب شي أتباق تاليانييا
transl: I'm in the mood for Italian food tonight, let's try a new Italian restaurant.

eng: you're right, it's been a while since we treated ourselves to a nice restaurant
darija_ar: ديال بساح مودا هادي ماتهلينا فراسّنا و مشينا لشي رستورا نادي
transl: We went for a walk in the square, then we headed to a nice restaurant.

eng: i've heard they combine flavors from different cuisines
darija_ar: لي سمعت راهوم كيخلتو ماداقات ديال لماكلا ديلا بولدان كتيرا ?
transl: Did you hear that they make delicious dishes at the restaurant in Bouldan Square?

eng: i've heard the restaurant has a rooftop seating area with a view
darija_ar: لي سمعت رستورا عندهوم واحد لڭلسّ لفوق مهويا عندها شفا ناديا
transl: I heard that the restaurant has a chef who is famous for his delicious dishes.
